p: Hence, the objective of this study was to develop a transdermal patch of lamotrigine for the better management of anti-convulsive therapy, alone or in combination. Transdermal patches avoid first-pass metabolism and require lower initial concentration for therapeutic effect (Hillery and Park 2016). This study also helps in assessing the impact of various permeation enhancers on in vitro release and skin permeation of drug from matrix patches. The compatibility of the drug with excipients was also studied through FTIR technique. The optimized patch was further evaluated for skin sensitivity reaction to ensure that the formulated patch is suitable for skin application.
